Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Vehicle
        • Turtle
  • public class Turtle
extends Vehicle
    Class that represents a Vehicle that is sometimes there and other times emotionally distant. When emotionally distant, Turtle does not provide any support to the Player. ** Warning ** Emotionally unstable, may turn emotionally distant at any time
